verses.verse: Now these <WH428> are [the territories] which <WH834> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> inherited <WH5157> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> which <WH834> Eleazar <WH499> the priest, <WH3548> and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> and the heads <WH7218> of the households of the tribes <WH1> of the sons <WH4294> of Israel <WH1121> apportioned <WH3478> to them for an inheritance, <WH5157>
by the lot <WH1486> of their inheritance, <WH5159> as the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> through <WH3027> Moses, <WH4872> for the nine <WH8672> tribes <WH4294> and the half-tribe.

For Moses <WH4872> had given <WH5414> the inheritance <WH5159> of the two <WH8147> tribes <WH4294> and the half-tribe beyond <WH4480> <WH5676> the Jordan; <WH3383> but he did not give <WH5414> an inheritance <WH5159> to the Levites <WH3881> among <WH8432> them.

For the sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> were two <WH8147> tribes, <WH4294> Manasseh <WH4519> and Ephraim, <WH669> and they did not give <WH5414> a portion <WH2506> to the Levites <WH3881> in the land, <WH776> except <WH3588> <WH518> cities <WH5892> to live <WH3427> in, with their pasture <WH4054> lands <WH4054> for their livestock <WH4735> and for their property. <WH7075>
Thus <WH3651> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> just <WH9201> as the Lord <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> Moses, <WH4872> and they divided <WH2505> the land. <WH776>

Then the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> drew <WH5066> near <WH5066> to Joshua <WH3091> in Gilgal, <WH1537> and Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312> the Kenizzite <WH7074> said <WH559> to him, "You know <WH3045> the word <WH1697> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> the man <WH376> of God <WH430> concerning <WH5921> <WH182> you and me in Kadesh-barnea.

"I was forty <WH705> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the Lord <WH3068> sent <WH7971> me from Kadesh-barnea to spy <WH7270> out the land, <WH776> and I brought <WH7725> word <WH1697> back <WH7725> to him as [it was] in my heart. <WH3824>

"Nevertheless my brethren <WH251> who <WH834> went <WH5927> up with me made the heart <WH3820> of the people <WH5971> melt <WH4529> with fear; <WH4529> but I followed <WH310> the Lord <WH3068> my God <WH430> fully. <WH4390>

"So Moses <WH4872> swore <WH7650> on that day, <WH3117> saying, <WH559> 'Surely <WH518> <WH3808> the land <WH776> on which <WH834> your foot <WH7272> has trodden <WH1869> shall be an inheritance <WH5159> to you and to your children <WH1121> forever, <WH5704> <WH5769> because <WH3588> you have followed <WH310> the Lord <WH3068> my God <WH430> fully. <WH4390>'

"And now <WH6258> behold, <WH2009> the Lord <WH3068> has let me live, <WH2421> just <WH9201> as He spoke, <WH1696> these <WH2088> forty-five years, <WH8141> from the time <WH227> that the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> this <WH2088> word <WH1697> to Moses, <WH4872> when <WH834> Israel <WH3478> walked <WH1980> in the wilderness; <WH4057> and now <WH6258> behold, <WH2009> I am eighty-five years <WH8141> old <WH1121> today. <WH3117>

"I am still <WH5750> as strong <WH2389> today <WH3117> as I was in the day <WH3117> Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> me; as my strength <WH3581> was then, <WH227> so my strength <WH3581> is now, <WH6258> for war <WH4421> and for going <WH3318> out and coming <WH935> in.

"Now <WH6258> then, give <WH5414> me this <WH2088> hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> about which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> on that day, <WH3117> for you heard <WH8085> on that day <WH3117> that Anakim <WH6062> [were] there, <WH8033> with great <WH1419> fortified <WH1219> cities; <WH5892> perhaps <WH194> the Lord <WH3068> will be with me, and I shall drive <WH3423> them out as the Lord <WH3068> has spoken. <WH1696>"
So Joshua <WH3091> blessed <WH1288> him, and gave <WH5414> Hebron <WH2275> to Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312> for an inheritance. <WH5159>

Therefore, <WH5921> <WH3651> Hebron <WH2275> became <WH1961> the inheritance <WH5159> of Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312> the Kenizzite <WH7074> until <WH5704> this <WH2088> day, <WH3117> because <WH3282> <WH834> he followed <WH310> the Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> fully. <WH4390>

Now the name <WH8034> of Hebron <WH2275> was formerly <WH6440> Kiriath-arba; [for Arba] was the greatest <WH1419> man <WH120> among the Anakim. <WH6062> Then the land <WH776> had <WH8252> rest <WH8252> from war. <WH4421>
